mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(COMMENT_NO) FROM COMTN_COMMENT a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND a.NTT_ID = #{nttId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'

SELECT a.COMMENT_NO , a.NTT_ID , a.BBS_ID , a.WRTER_ID , a.WRTER_NM , a.PASSWORD AS "commentPassword" , a.COMMENT_CN , a.USE_AT , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS "frstRegisterNm" , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" FROM COMTN_COMMENT a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
